value:
I'm told this is the garb of a witch
who flies through the sky at night.
Sounds like a Nohrian to me.

Costumes are so interesting. Wearing
one lets you become a completely
different person for a while.

I like the idea of Nohr and Hoshido
celebrating each other's fashions.
It fosters mutual understanding.

I have plenty of sweets. Would you
like one? OK, open wide—here comes
the candy broom!

See these bats? I trapped them in
webs. That's what happens when
you try to trick me!

Want to join us for a harvest festival
celebration? Get your costume and
come to $Nf's!

Are you enjoying this harvest festival
as much as I am?

I won't stand for anyone getting in
the way of others' dreams!

Oh no... I dropped the whole bag
of candy...
Festivals are the best! Thank you!

I'm Corrin. Leave it to me to light up
this festival like a twinkling starry sky!

Hi there! Nice to see you! Are you
having a good time at tonight's
festivities, $Nu?$k$pGet this—I asked my siblings what
they thought my costume was meant
to be, and they all said "Nohr Noble."$k$pSilly, right? It's got pumpkins and a
broom and everything. I mean, I guess
the colors are a bit Nohrian, but...$k$pIt got me thinking. It's interesting how
people are drawn to what they know,
even when they're far from home.$k$pThat could explain why we see some
of the same things over and over
again. Conflict, for example.$k$pSorry, I don't mean to be a downer.
Enjoying the harvest festival is what
matters now—let's get back to that!
Trick or treat!
How's this?
Ready to be scared?
Candy, please!
I got tricked...
Trick or treat! I'm dressed like a witch today.
*surprise sound* Was that a trick? I'll give you a treat—just don't do that again.
Believe it or not, I've been to a similar festival in my own world.
After everyone collects heaps of candy, we all get together and enjoy the spoils, right? I can't wait!
I can give my siblings treats, but only after they play a trick on me, right?
If I were a real witch, I could probably help a lot of people.
You need a costume. Let's see... I know! How about an adorable wolf?
As expected!
This way?
Costume parade!
